== Main Inclusion Report (Draft) for kde-style-polyester ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/p/polyester/, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** This package contains the widget style that will become default in Kubuntu Feisty.
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=Polyester|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=Polyester|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'medium'.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:kde-style-polyester|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.kde-look.org/content/show.php?content=27968|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper/cdbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** kdelibs4c2a (>= 4:3.5.5-1)
** kwin (>= 4:3.5.5-1)
** libc6 (>= 2.5-0ubuntu1)
** libgcc1 (>= 1:4.1.1-21ubuntu1)
** libstdc++6 (>= 4.1.1-21ubuntu1)

** All in main.

=== Reviewers ===

This is all straightforward, so this package is '''accepted'''.  -IanJackson 2.2.2007
